Articles.Content: Spartwo, I'm trying to claim that whole crater area. Please don't claim it before I get this thing working. D:

I Can't anyway by the time I would get there you would have it surrounded at least one time over.

@Zekes:gods speed

3....2...1.... LAUNCH!

T+37 seconds, Main SRBs decouple. Currently Nominal Ascent.

T+6 minutes: Kerbin Orbit acheived. Awaiting Munar Transfer window.

Edited November 14, 2013 by zekes
I think that is just a regular window.

I think that is just a regular window.

not really, we are in a 35 degree eliptical orbit (thanks to where Zokesia is) because i actually launched from Notillian (which is at -35 degrees down)
Where are spots I can take? Or do I just plant down a base somewhere somebody doesn't control?

Huh. So I'm not the only one getting that weird FX glitch with the big SRBs. I wonder what causes it?

EDIT: Pretty much. Just take a hex really.
If it's not too late to join up, would you guys mind if I took some undesireable hex in the far north after reading up on the rules tonight?

And tat is why we use Florida to launch from Its along the equator. I told you guys you could use KSC for those types of thing. Leave it to Zekes to try to one up the competition. When we get to mun bases and the lot ill explain how to set up extra-planetary hexes. that also means i have to make the maps... fun...

If it's not too late to join up, would you guys mind if I took some undesireable hex in the far north after reading up on the rules tonight?

Go right ahead. I'm leading a mercenary group.

If it's not too late to join up, would you guys mind if I took some undesireable hex in the far north after reading up on the rules tonight?

Super big want to share some land with another country? I'll be up far in the north. I'll promise you that I'll share land and troops for you to use in important times.

AND TOUCHDOWN! <clapclapclapclap> This is the first ship, launched from our bare-bones Space Center, and under 100 parts, to land two kerbals on the mun! This is a great achievement for Zokesia and for Kerbals!

Ludlom Kerman was the first to step down, and planted the flag, while Genegun followed and set up the camera.

Solid

I will use the 0.0.1 alpha of my boardgame strategy.

AND TOUCHDOWN! <clapclapclapclap>

Ludlom Kerman was the first to step down, and planted the flag, while Genegun followed and set up the camera.

Nice job zekes.. Hope to see you in space

Solid

I will use the 0.0.1 alpha of my boardgame strategy.

Thanks for the alliance. Im planning on setting up base near the north pole. Where I would have an advantage with mountains.

I'll promise you that I'll share land and troops for you to use in important times.

Or he could hire Damage Incorporated. Either way.

Can I place a launch site at my base hex? And launch everything from there? Whenever I want? Or does it have to coincide with a challenge or mission?

EDIT: In this thread my company /country /thing will be: the United States of Japan. (Yet another code geass reference)

Edited November 14, 2013 by Deathsoul097
Arcadian Sat launch delayed due to stomach problems
Zekes, can you make a custom black space suit with a lime-green (left-pointing) star for me please? :3

Or he could hire Damage Incorporated. Either way.

I keep my promises.. And is that whats your country called?

Zekes, can you make a custom black space suit with a lime-green (left-pointing) star for me please? :3

I'll give it a shot when i can

Right now i'm... doing science.
Looks like Zokesia got the the Mun first. Congrats!

Looks like Zokesia got the the Mun first. Congrats!

Thanks!

..aaaand back! Textbook mission, all that training paid off! Not a single quicksave was needed!

Gallery from Munar takeoff to landing on the moors north of Zokesia.
Where the heck is the perstince files.

To all newcomers please read the rules and make sure that you use the map to show me where your first hex is. Also with the new addition of so many new players be sure to use the Kerbal Maps app and give me some general coordinates. At the moment I'm merely looking for differences in the map but this can become problematic with more players. Also if you can post important stuff for me in Blue or what would be even better is to PM me thank you and welcome to Kerbal Powers Board Game.

Thanks but where do I find the perstence file...
